Title: SSIS SMSTask
Description: SSIS Task to send SMS (Short Message Service) over a SMS Gateway per HTTP/HTTPS.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SSIS Task to send SMS (Short Message Service) over a SMS Gateway per HTTP/HTTPS.

This task sends SMS instead of the inbuilt email task, jabber (http://www.cozyroc.com/ssis/jabber-task) or twitter (http://www.codeplex.com/SSISTwitterSuite) in Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services 2008.





I have added some new gateway providers.
Because Clickatel and some other providers need special paramter, you can now define custom provider parameters.





Currently only SMSOut (http://www.smsout.de) - a German gateway provider - is tested.

Provider URL Tested
Clickatellhttp://www.clickatell.com
OpenIThttp://www.openIT.de
SMS kaufenhttp://www.smskaufen.de
SMS4http://www.sms4.de
SMS77http://www.sms77.de
SMSOuthttp://www.smsout.de
TeamMessagehttp://www.TeamMessage.de


I hope somebody can test a gateway provider or will send me more http api.

When you are looking for more SSIS Tasks please visit my german blog http://www.ssis-components.net (Components).
